review.title: “R DESIGNS LTD has a great atmosphere with very friendly people.”
review.pros: Pros – Working at R DESIGNS LTD was very good. Great atmosphere with very friendly people. Professional little company which enjoyed giving a good service to its customers at a great price.
review.cons: Cons – No room for promotion as it's a small company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Leadship was very good!
